title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.7 - Compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.7 - Compliance

State Regulations

If the employer does not arrange for a workplace safety
and loss prevention consultation and evaluation or fails to implement
recommended remedial action within the times prescribed, the insurer shall
surcharge the employer's manual rate premium by.05 (five percent) for the next
ensuing policy period. For each policy period that noncompliance continues, an
additional.05 (five percent) surcharge shall be charged by the
insurer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
59-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
